org.eclipse.persistence.sessions.serializers
Interface Serializer

All Known Implementing Classes:
JavaSerializer, JSONSerializer, KryoSerializer, XMLSerializer
public interface Serializer

Generic serializer interface. Allows for a plugable serializer for Remote, Cache Coordination, Converters.

Author:
James Sutherland
